name: Light Design Guide Template v2.0
description:
Being creative on demand can be really difficult. That's why I believe that the more you can standardise the less burden you'll have on your creative process, saving time and energy for the important things.


This design guide provides you with a theme as well as design guidelines for your brand. Take our design file and make it your own!


Design file includes: design principles, typography, colour, effects, and assets and comes in a dark and a light example. Both files have built-in figma styles based on Material Design conventions, making it quick and easy to adapt and apply to your figma projects or export for broader distribution.
